issue.title: Cached models lose server and name information

content.raw: It looks good to me. My only concern is about the version number. The version captures the API version that we use to communicate with the server but I believe it should be independent of the models. This is something we should capture in the configuration file associated to each server. Do you have any reason to include it here?
content.html: It looks good to me. My only concern is about the version number. The version captures the API version that we use to communicate with the server but I believe it should be independent of the models. This is something we should capture in the configuration file associated to each server. Do you have any reason to include it here?
